about_the_game:
Terminal Error is still in the works!



Deep in the forest, there is a hidden research centre known for its cutting edge advancements in technology. Most nights at the facility are uneventful, but some unfortunate circumstances seem to have befallen the secret base this time…

Trapped in the facility with horrors of monstrous proportions, you must navigate through the haunting hallways of the research centre alone and helpless. Armed with only a torchlight in hand, you must solve puzzles, avoid enemies, and find your way out before it is too late.

Will you make it out alive, or will you end up like everyone else?



- 3D First-person point-and-click horror
- Puzzle-solving elements and minigames
- Immersive, atmospheric horror setting
- Unique and distinct visuals

content_descriptors.notes: There are some references to mild violence and gore present, but nothing explicitly grotesque.

name: Terminal Error Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, (2 GB VRAM) | AMD Radeon HD 7870, (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with (4GB VRAM) | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4GB VRAM )
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Preyed upon by grotesque experiments, you must find a way out of the research centre alive in this first-person point-and-click horror game. However, to escape, you must first delve hopelessly deeper into the maddening corridors of the facility.
